summary: Kizomba Kao, Forsworn Berserker combat style
descriptionHtml:
- ENGLISH - 

Meet Kainfrine\'s brother! (Kainfrine is here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34421)

Kizomba is at The Bannered Mare (Whiterun). He\'s essential.

Armor : Hunter
Ammo : Ebony arrows and bow, ebony warhammer

Ranger\'s competences, Forsworn Berserker combat style

- MODS USED ON KIZOMBA - 

ApachiiSkyHair - Full version (by Apachii) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

If you don\'t use this mod, Kizomba will be shaved.

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles (by Chris57 and FavoredSoul) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

If you don\'t use this mod, Kizomba will be in vanilla texture.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- FRENCH - 

Rencontrez le frère de Kainfrine! (Kainfrine est ici http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34421)

Kizomba se trouve à la jument pavoisée (Blancherive). Il est essential.

Armure : Chasseur
Armes : flèches et arc d\'ébonite - marteau de guerre d\'ébonite

Compétences Ranger, style de combat Forsworn Berserker

- MODS UTILISES SUR KIZOMBA - non obligatoires

ApachiiSkyHair - Full version (by Apachii) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Si vous n\'utilisez pas ce mod, Kizomba apparaîtra le crâne rasé.

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles (by Chris57 and FavoredSoul) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Si vous n\'utilisez pas ce mod, Kizomba sera en texture vanilla.
author: Fonkyb
